text: Sparta Brodnica is a Polish football club playing currently in IV Liga. Founded in 1913 as Gymnasial Fussbal Club, it is based in Brodnica and plays at the Brodnica OSiR Stadium. The club was most successful in the nineties.Sparta Brodnica at 90minut.pl Most famous players of BKS Sparta are Łukasz Fabiański, Jakub Wawrzyniak, Robert Kłos and Jakub Zabłocki. ==League Participations== Second Level: (6 seasons), 1994–1995, 1998–1999, 1999–2000, 2000–2001, 2001–2002, 2002–2003 ==Current squad== Players 2017 at sparta- brodnica.futbolowo.plPlayers 2017 at laczynaspilka.pl] Players 2015/16 at 90minut.pl ==References== ==External links== *Sparta official website (Polish) *Sparta Brodnica at facebook.com (Polish) *Sparta Brodnica at the facebook.com website (Polish) *Sparta Brodnica at the 90minut.pl website (Polish) Category:Association football clubs established in 1913 Category:Brodnica County Category:Football clubs in Kuyavian-Pomeranian Voivodeship Category:1913 establishments in Germany Category:1913 establishments in Poland
title: Sparta Brodnica
